definition: to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: At the same time, this fact fetter the trick of the judicial authority, indulge the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 同时也束缚了司法机关的手脚，造成宽纵罪犯的后果。

sentences.english: If a crime is constituted, he shall be transferred to the department of justice and subject to criminal liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 构成犯罪的，依法移交司法机关追究其刑事责任。

sentences.english: The setting and moving of the judicatory should follow the law of its own.
sentences.chinese: 司法独立更有助于司法机关完成定纷止争的使命。

sentences.english: Arrestment is not a strategy merely decided by judicatory organ, but a Nash equilibrium which involves the judicatory organ and suspect.
sentences.chinese: 逮捕是一种并非由司法机关单方意志决定的策略行为。

sentences.english: China is a country under the rule of law. The judiacial authorities handle all cases indepedently in accordance with the law.
sentences.chinese: 中国是法制国家，司法机关依法独立办理各类案件。

sentences.english: The judicial organs have adopted vigorous measures to prevent and contain extended detention.
sentences.chinese: 司法机关采取有力措施预防和遏制超期羁押。

sentences.english: Chinese law and judicial organs shall punish intervention units.
sentences.chinese: 中国法律与司法机关单位应介入查办。

sentences.english: Cases suspected of constituting a crime shall be transferred to the judicial department for prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 涉嫌犯罪的要及时移送司法机关追究刑事责任。

sentences.english: Original "Permanent Disability Certificate" issued by Grade 3A or above hospital or judiciary institutions.
sentences.chinese: 司法机关或三甲以上医院出具的《伤残鉴定书》原件。

sentences.english: If crimes have been constituted, the violators should be transferred to the judicial organs and investigated for criminal responsibility according to law.
sentences.chinese: 构成犯罪的，要移交司法机关，依法追究刑事责任。

sentences.english: If a crime is suspected, the case shall be transferred to judicial authorities to pursue criminal liability.
sentences.chinese: 涉嫌犯罪的，依法移交司法机关追究其刑事责任。

sentences.english: Baby abandonment is an issue that needs collaborative efforts of social security departments and judicial agencies to solve.
sentences.chinese: 弃婴行为需要社会保障部门和司法机关共同解决。

sentences.english: Court verdict is the judgement verdict for the law cases of the ancient Chinese legislative organ.
sentences.chinese: 判词是中国古代司法机关审理案件的裁决判定书。

sentences.english: If inform against person feel no-go , also welcome direct to judiciary impeach.
sentences.chinese: 假如举报者觉得不方便，也欢迎直接向司法机关检举。

definition: to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
